messages.title: A Brighter Future for Our Mental Health Services...
messages.content: The NHS may be the envy of the world, but our mental health service is not. People are struggling. When they turn for help, it is often not there. Waiting times for mental health services are, on average, 14 weeks - just for an assessment - before support and care has even begun. Problems that can start small, become crises as help is either not available, or arrives late. The Liberal Democrats have a plan to tackle this. They have pledged to ringfence funding for mental health and put extra investment into services. They will also ensure services run 24 hours a day, seven days a week. The Liberal Democrats will increase mental health staffing and will ensure that, by 2025, 100% of children and young people with diagnosable conditions get NHS treatment.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Ringfence funding for mental health, increase investment in services, ensure services run 24/7, increase mental health staffing. By 2025, ensure 100% of children and young people with diagnosable conditions get NHS treatment.

quotes.text: Poll reveals majority believe lying Boris Johnson will sell off NHS services to US.

If Boris Johnson remains as Prime Minister, things will only get worse for our NHS.
Donald Trump has made it clear that the NHS would be part of negotiating any trade deals with the US.
